synopsis.text: Punch your way into the thrilling short anime by "One Punch Man" illustrator Yuusuke Murata, titled "Go! Saitama." In this action-packed tale, our beloved hero Saitama faces a challenge unlike any other. Discovering a once-in-a-lifetime sale for premium hot-pot meat priced at a mere 1 yen (approximately US$0.01), Saitama must race against time to reach the supermarket before the deal expires at 5:00 p.m. Witness Saitama's determination as he pushes himself to the limits in this heart-pounding adventure, initially shared on Yuusuke Murata's Twitter.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
